text_logic_form: The length of the line $AP$ is $3x - 1$ units.
The length of the line $PC$ is $x + 9$ units.
Find the length of the line $AC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $AP$ is $3x - 1$ units.
The length of the line $PC$ is $x + 9$ units.
Find the length of the line $AC$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
The lines connecting $A$ and $P$, and $D$ and $P$ are perpendicular.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $BA$, and $CD$, forming the rhombus $ABCD$.
